title: Binding clips
content:
Hello.

Does any one know what these binding 'clips' are called?

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015080750im_/http:/typophile.com/files/95_04_3732.jpg)
author: sambryan

comments.content: I believe it is called loop stitching.

I think they're just a kid of staple...and tmac is right, I think they're called "loop stitching."

[http://russellandhazel.stores.yahoo.net/fieldnotebook.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015080750/http:/russellandhazel.stores.yahoo.net/fieldnotebook.html "http://russellandhazel.stores.yahoo.net/fieldnotebook.html")

[http://bindingsupplies.co.uk/products/prod:Ring\_King/prodID:P44E481709946C/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015080750/http:/bindingsupplies.co.uk/products/prod:Ring_King/prodID:P44E481709946C/ "http://bindingsupplies.co.uk/products/prod:Ring\_King/prodID:P44E481709946C/")  
Apparently the "Ring King" looks like the most affordable way to do this, but they're still kind of expensive staplers.
